programme.title: MXGP of Portugal, Agueda
programme.desc: MXGP is the worlds' most popular dirt bike championship with up to 20 events on off-road courses.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Poland, Krakow, Tauron Arena
programme.desc: Superenduro is an indoor motorcycle championship where drivers have to beat their competition in sprint races whilst running over obstacles on the track.

programme.title: Australian Motocross Championship
programme.desc: The Australian ProMX Championship is the nation's premier motocross championship. The series acts as a successful development platform for young Australian talent and is designed as a tiered system with three dedicated classes: MX3 for younger drivers, the MX2 for senior drivers and the MX1, which is the elite category in the championship.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Andorra
programme.desc: X-Trial World Championship.

programme.title: Australian Superbike Championship
programme.desc: ASBK.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Trailer Stunt) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «The Trailer Stunt»Today they are in Triptis - in the heart of Thuringen, on the Industrial site of the Fliegl vehicle Company - they have criminal activity on their minds...

programme.title: Supercars S2
programme.desc: Slimmer than ever - and a brawny 330 horsepower. The sportiest Porsche Cayman of all time. The Cayman R - not only die-hard Porsche fans love this car.

programme.title: Classic Ride S7
programme.desc: Rally Legends! High-tech turbo cars from the wild eighties meet together again at the 'SalzburgRing'. Small Italian two-seater with mid-engine. The Lancia Beta Monte Carlo offers classic cars driving pleasure at a low entry price.

programme.title: Formula E - Specials
programme.desc: Launched in 2014, the Formula E is the world's best-known and most important electric car racing series. MOTORVISION TV counts down the 100 best moments from previous Formula E seasons.

programme.title: 400 Thunder Australian Drag Racing Series
programme.desc: The 400 Thunder is the top racing series for professional drag racing from Australia and is a superlative spectacle. Loud engines, insane speeds and lots of burnt rubber are guaranteed! Because in thrilling duels on the quarter mile, the 3000 HP dragsters accelerate with brutal forces up to 500 kilometers per hour and race over the drag strip in just six seconds.

programme.title: 1000 km Race Nurburgring 1984
programme.desc: Nuerburgring one of the world's classic race circuits set on'. germany Eifel mountains. But time has changed. The historic 22 kilometers has been ' off and a modern clinical 4,5 kilometer race track has taken its place. For the past year'. have planed the land and financiers have '. 20 million pounds into "Der neue Nuerburgring" this was a scene last year 1.000 kilometers.

programme.title: Legendary Races: Targa Florio and Mille Miglia
programme.desc: Italy was home to two of the most famous road races of the 20th century: the Targa Florio and the Mille Miglia. From their very inception, these city to city road races were linked with both glamour and mortality, as racers lost their lives in pursuit of pace. The Targa, for example, was set on the mountain roads of Sicily and featured hairpin bends and dramatic changes of elevation. The Mille Miglia, on the other hand, made legends of marques like Alfa Romeo, Maserati, Mercedes-Benz, and Porsche.

programme.title: Automobilisme : Grand Prix de Monaco historique
programme.desc: Do you miss the thrilling motorsports from yesteryear? Take a trip with Motorvision.TV to the French Riviera, when the Grand Prix de Monaco Historique turns back the wheel of time and brings back legendary racing cars for one more adrenaline-filled race featuring high speeds, risky maneuvers and head-to-head fights that we all love in motorsports.

programme.title: Classic Ride S4
programme.desc: A small group of car enthusiastic ladies offers resistance in the otherwise man dominated oldtimer world . One of them is Johanna. The 24-year-old loves her 69s Corvette more than everything. And she would never let a man sit behind the steering wheel of her V8.

programme.title: German Rallye Championship 1983
programme.desc: The German rally championship is one of the most popular motorsport series and has been running since 1970. At the 1983 race, the sporty models from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Chantilly Arts & Elegance Richard Mille
programme.desc: The multiple-award winning Chantilly Arts & Elegance Richard Mille is back for its fifth edition to celebrate the French way of life in many different sectors such as the motorcar industry, gastronomy, art and luxury. The event features a diverse array of activities including three automobile contests and two rallies.

programme.title: Rallye Monte Carlo Historique
programme.desc: The infamous Monte-Carlo Rally is one of the world's oldest rally events in the world. To pay tribute to its long-lasting history, the Automobile Club de Monaco organizes the Rallye Monte-Carlo Historique. The catch is: Only cars that competed in the Monte-Carlo Rally at least 40 years ago are allowed to take part in the historic edition of the Monte-Carlo Rally.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Special Stunt Highlights) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Special Stunt Highlights»Stunt Heroes - all the stunts from the first season .... now!

programme.title: Supercars S2
programme.desc: A Ferrari is tight, impractical and can only be used in the sunshine on dry roads. These times are now finally over. The Ferrari FF, the first family-friendly GT sports car - with 4-wheel drive, V12 engine and 660 hp.

programme.title: Classic Ride S6
programme.desc: Revisiting the past to portray the classic and veteran cars of decades gone by, meeting the personalities who wrote automotive history, sending very old cars running round very fast circuits.

programme.title: Formula E - Specials
programme.desc: Episode one of The Story Of Formula E explores how the all-electric championship survived fierce scepticism and a financial crisis in its first season to establish itself as a bonafide racing series, promoting clean, sustainable mobility in the world's most iconic cities.

programme.title: WeatherTech SportsCar Championship
programme.desc: The IMSA Weathertech Sportscar Championship is back on MOTORVISION TV. Twelve races are again scheduled for the 2022 season, including four endurance classics. Motorvision TV provides live and extensive highlights coverage of all events.

programme.title: Jet Ski World Series
programme.desc: WGP#1 World Series.

programme.title: GP of Italy, Regione Sardegna
programme.desc: In 2022, the UIM is once again hosting its Formula 1 World Championship in Powerboat. In the 37th season, ten teams with 19 drivers from eleven countries have signed up to fight for the title of the new world champion in three Grand Prix.

programme.title: Australian V8 Superboats Championship
programme.desc: The Australian V8 Superboat Championship is one of the most important watersports series from down under. Drivers compete in three different classes: the LS Class, Group A and Unlimited, which features hardly any restrictions regarding engine sizes. In 2022, a total of seven rounds are scheduled before a new champion is crowned.

programme.title: Powerboat: P1 USA AquaX Championship
programme.desc: AquaX Championship.

programme.title: UIM Class 1 Powerboat Championship
programme.desc: Want to cool down? The Class 1 Offshore Championship featuring boats with twin inboard 1100hp engines that can reach speeds in excess of 160mph. All boats, which are around 12-14 meters long and 3.5 meters wide, are limited by a minimum weight of 4,950 kilos.

programme.title: P1 Offshore Championship
programme.desc: The P1 Offshore Powerboat Championship promises tightly fought offshore racing with powerboats reaching top speeds of up to 100 miles per hour. Five events are schedules for the 2022 season and Motorvision.TV brings you all the thrilling action from each event!

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Gravel Pit) S2 (n°19)
programme.desc: «The Gravel Pit»Heavy equipment comes into use - as a car has to crash at full speed into a pile of gravel...

programme.title: Supercars S2
programme.desc: Probably the fastest four-seater in the world is being built. In 2013 and the up to 1000 horsepower high flyer with four doors and four seats should be ready in the Alsatian Molsheim Bugatti work - mostly hand made.

programme.title: Classic Ride S7
programme.desc: Cruising like in "Miss Marple" times. The 1947 Triumph 1800 Roadster has space for 5 fresh air fans. Le Jog - the toughest classic car rally in Europe. A German women's team takes on the challenge in the VW Iltis. In addition, charming small Cabriolet from the brass age. The 1919 Wolseley Stellite.

programme.title: Preview 1
programme.desc: Extreme E is a racing series for SUVs with electric motors that will be held worldwide from 2021. In the race, all teams compete with the same vehicles, which are powered by two electric motors and are allowed to produce a maximum of 500kW (680HP).

programme.title: 400 Thunder Australian Drag Racing Series
programme.desc: The 400 Thunder is the top racing series for professional drag racing from Australia and is a superlative spectacle. Loud engines, insane speeds and lots of burnt rubber are guaranteed! Because in thrilling duels on the quarter mile, the 3000 HP dragsters accelerate with brutal forces up to 500 kilometers per hour and race over the drag strip in just six seconds.

programme.title: AWD Safari Challenge
programme.desc: AWDC.

programme.title: Hi-Tec Drift Allstars Series Australia
programme.desc: The latest drifting competition on Motorvision.TV brings you the best drifters from Australia. Join us for thrilling duels, smoking wheels and non-stop drift battles for the Drift All Stars Series title.

programme.title: Houston Race 5
programme.desc: Monster Jam is an American monster truck series where drivers have to perform stunts and race against each other.

programme.title: Top Fuel Australia Championship
programme.desc: Australian Drag Racing Championship.

programme.title: National Legend Cars
programme.desc: The Legends Cars National Championship brings back racing from yesteryear. The series features 5/8 scale replicas of pre-war 1930s Fords, Chevys and Dodges that are equipped with 125bhp-motorcycle engines. These cars are well known for delivering high-octane battles on race tracks around Great Britain.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Car Action Highlights) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Car Action Highlights»Ther are million ways to destroy a car: Crashes, flips and jumps. We show the highlights of this seasons car stunts.

programme.title: Supercars S2
programme.desc: The evolutionary history of the Infinity FX50, Sebastian Vettel Edition. 1.370 Kg and 620 horsepower - this is the Porsche GT2 RS. This car is the most expensive and fastest serial 911 Porsche all times.

programme.title: Classic Ride S6
programme.desc: The VW: Type 166 Amphibious Vehicle is the all-rounder amongst off-road vehicles. Peugeot 205 Turbo 16. The French all-wheel cracker mixes up the World Rally Championship in the 80s. And : Willys Jeep in the Drive Report. The ascetic SUV conquered the World by storm and the hearts of off-road enthusiasts.

programme.title: Formula E - Specials
programme.desc: In less than six years the ABB FIA Formula E Championship has grown from ambitious start-up to one of the most innovative sports entertainment properties in the world, attracting a host of the globe's biggest automotive manufacturers. The Story Of Formula E plots the extraordinary rise of the all-electric championship with some of the key players including Lucas Di Grassi, Jean Eric Vergne, Sebastien Buemi, Sam Bird and founder Alejandro Agag.
